<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Router Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/routers/{router_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve detailed information about a specific router in OpenStack identified by its unique ID.


## Request
